sections.heading: heads; salaries; powers of Governor
sections.text: The Governor shall have authority to establish the salaries of all persons connected with the various departments including the heads thereof.SourceLaws 1929, c. 51, ยง 3, p. 210;C.S.1929, ยง 81-103;Laws 1933, c. 149, ยง 3, p. 572;Laws 1937, c. 194, ยง 1, p. 789;Laws
